item.title: A 'terrible spiral of escalation': World braces for intensifying Iran-Israel conflict
item.description: Chances at diplomacy are looking bleak as Iran and Israel continue to trade increasingly deadly blows.

item.title: Trump rips into 'too late' Jerome Powell after Fed holds rates steady
item.description: President Donald Trump has long criticized Federal Reserve Chair Jerome Powell for not lowering interest rates.

item.title: Trump meets with national security team on Iran as U.S. prepares to evacuate citizens from Israel
item.description: U.S. President Donald Trump has called for Iran's "UNCONDITIONAL SURRENDER!"
